gpgmail-pref-enable: Label for the checkbox in preferences which enables encryption.
gpgmail-pref-key: Label for the textarea in preferences where the public key must be pasted.
gpgmail-pref-key-help: Extra information in addition to {{msg-mw|gpgmail-pref-key}} on GPG keys.
gpgmail-encrypt-error: Error message used when the encryption failed. For privacy reasons only shown when sending a message to yourself (via CC).
